title: 107 athletes banned from London Olympics for doping
description: More than 100 athletes have been barred from taking part in the London Olympics on the charges of doping, World Anti-Doping Agency President John Fahey said.
cleanContent: More than 100 athletes have been barred from taking part in the London Olympics on the charges of doping, World Anti-Doping Agency President John Fahey said.He said that through mid-June at least 107 athletes have been banned from the games. Fahey did not say what countries the banned athletes come from.The London Games kick off July 27 and run until August 12.(Agencies)																																																																								|  |
